feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Open PhD Position
entry.content: I am looking for students interested in working on theoretical aspects of cryptography as part of a fully funded PhD position at the University of Edinburgh. Don’t hesitate to get in contanct with me if you are interested.
entry.summary: I am looking for students interested in working on theoretical aspects of cryptography as part of a fully funded PhD position at the University of Edinburgh. Don’t hesitate to get in contanct with me if you are interested.
